mapper.insert: insert into homegym values( #{hg_mem_id}, #{hg_nickname}, #{hg_person_count}, #{hg_price}, #{hg_info}, '0', #{hg_faddr}, #{hg_saddr}, #{hg_station}, #{hg_comeinfo}, to_date(#{hg_start_date},'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{hg_end_date},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{hg_not_date}, #{hg_start_time}, #{hg_end_time}, sysdate, sysdate, '0')
mapper.select: select hg_nickname from homegym where hg_nickname = #{hg_nickname}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from (select h.*, eqlist.hg_eq from (select eq_mem_id, LISTAGG(eq_name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY eq_name) as hg_eq FROM homegym_equipment group by eq_mem_id) eqlist, homegym h where h.hg_mem_id = eqlist.eq_mem_id )b where
hg_faddr like '%${location}%' and
hg_start_date <= '${choice_date_d}' and hg_end_date >= '${choice_date_d}' and
hg_eq like '%${arr}%' and
hg_price >= ${price} and hg_person_count >= ${person_count} and hg_approved_check = '1' and hg_status = '1' ) c where rnum between ${start} and ${end}
